issue.title: [C++] Support for LargeBinary and LargeString in the hash kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7802](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7802). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently they are not supported:

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/a76e277213e166dbeb148260498995ba053566fb/cpp/src/arrow/compute/kernels/hash.cc#L456

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7802?focusedCommentId=17058016) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6548
